title: How Do I Stop Relationship Failures?
description:
Alvin is going through another divorce after having rushed into marriage to avoid being single. - Dr. Laura: "Don't eat the poison just because you're hungry."

Which of the 10 Stupid Things I've written about have you discovered yourself doing? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
